Date: Wednesday, 6/11/1989
Subject: Tony Pena Sr. learns new position

learning his new position, Leftfield.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director

Date: Thursday, 6/26/1989
Subject: Wondering
Boss,
What about my playing time? Am I not
good enough to play regularly for this
team? I'm not a happy camper right now. If that doesn't
change, trade me!

Regards,
Candy Maldonado

Date: Monday, 6/30/1989
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Jeff Holly

to promote him soon!
